channel.title: Elyrion - RS Emulation
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://elyrion718.netne.net/images/elyrion.gif[/img]
[SIZE=5]- The server is 100% Free, you don't need to pay anything to get more features ![/SIZE]
- About This Server & History - Elyrion is a RS Emulation of 2012, When RuneScape came with "Evolution Of Combat", I left RuneScape. I was so disgusted about the new RuneScape. Now I am making the popular version, RuneScape 2012.
- Version Of The Server - - Currently on alpha stage - Revision: 718/742 - [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/ot4rmz7oaj8p0nt/Elyrion.jar?dl=0"]Download Elyrion Client[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://elyrion718.web44.net/"]Website (Temp)[/URL]
- Administrators - - Owner - Michael
- Moderators - None
- Working Skills - [IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/attack.gif[/img] - Attack - - Fully working
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/constitution.gif[/img] - Constitution - - Fully working
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/strength.gif[/img] - Strength - - Fully working
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/defence.gif[/img] - Defence - - Fully working
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/ranged.gif[/img] - Ranging - - Fully working
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/prayer.gif[/img] - Prayer - - Ash scattering - Bone Burying - Bones on altar
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/magic.gif[/img] - Magic - - All spells of ancient mage - Normal spellbook (/) - Lunar spellbook (14/51)
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/runecrafting.gif[/img] - Runecrafting - - All altars - Talisman locating
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/construction.gif[/img] - Construction -
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/dungeoneering.gif[/img] - Dungeoneering -
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/agility.gif[/img] - Agility - - Gnome course - Barbarian Outpost course - Wilderness course
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/herblore.gif[/img] - Herblore & Cleaning - - Herb cleaning - Potions (Unf) - Normal potions
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/thieving.gif[/img] - Thieving - - You can thieve all npcs - Stalls (Ardougne)
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/crafting.gif[/img] - Crafting - - Gem cutting - Spinning wheel - Jewelery smithing
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/fletching.gif[/img] - Fletching - - Creating all shortbows & longbows - Creating all darts - Creating all arrows - Fletching tips
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/slayer.gif[/img] - Slayer -
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/hunter.gif[/img] - Hunter -
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/mining.gif[/img] - Mining - - You can mine (19/21) ores
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/smithing.gif[/img] - Smithing & Forging - - Smelting all bars - Creating all pieces
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/fishing.gif[/img] - Fishing - - (16/31) Fishes you can fish - Moving spots
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/cooking.gif[/img] - Cooking - - All fishes
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/firemaking.gif[/img] - Firemaking & Bonfire - - You can light all Logs - You can put all logs into bonfire
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/woodcutting.gif[/img] - Woodcutting - - You can cut all trees - All correct stumps
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/farming.gif[/img] - Farming - - Allotements - Herbs - Compost bin - Flowers - Hops - Trees - Fruit trees - Bushes
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/summoning.gif[/img] - Summoning - - All scrolls[/CENTER]

item.title: Elyrion - RS Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Elyrion718 Elyrion718
item.description:
@Elyrion718 wrote:

briney21:

i tried this out its alright i mean the x5 xp is kinda low for a server that isnt complete i mean if you added like 40 quests then maybe, but also noticed a few shops around the place were missing. so yea gl

Thank you anyways

30/6/2015 Updates:
1- You may now create Restore potion + Combat potion
2- Updated G.E Prices
3- Added 2 new shops on Lumbridge
4- Added rock crabs at fremmenik
5- Removed useless drops on rock crabs

Read full topic

item.title: Elyrion - RS Emulation
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

To be honest, RuneScape was never even popular in 2012. 2009 onwards you are looking at a massive decline in activity. Also, stating that you have having working skills at a revision likes yours is almost laughable. It shouldn’t even be considered anything but obvious.

Read full topic
